sys_remote_update_set.description:
Bug: When an SCM change was copied the acceptance and prod date were prefilled from old change and start and end date were blank. Fix: Cleared out the acceptance and prod dates to be filled in by user.
Bug: TASKCOPY script used to copy all the number of tasks too in the new change, when SCM change is copied. Fix: Updated the script to comment out the function to copy tasks. Tasks are created through workflow.
Bug: No order validation between Start Date and Acceptance date Fix: Added validation.
Bug: For SCM changes, no dates validation was done from the Service Portal view. Fix: Updated script to validate dates in SCM change on Service Portal view.
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Fix SCM date validation on copy change function
